name: Pocket Planet
description:
What is Pocket Planet?

Do you want to build beautiful worlds without investing hours on end in stressful resource management? Say no more! Pocket Planet should be right up your alley.


Pocket Planet is a minimalist puzzle game about building dioramas on a hexagonal grid. Explore a large number of ever-changing new worlds featuring different biomes and enjoy the relaxing atmosphere.

This game offers you:

  • Intuitive and rewarding diorama-building gameplay
  • More than 200 levels divided into several worlds
  • Different biomes featuring different placement mechanics and combinations
  • A relaxing atmosphere
  • Beautiful, vibrant colors
  • Great for playing every now and then, discovering some new worlds and completing all the quests

Pocket Planet is inspired by amazing games like

  • Dorfromantik
  • Townscaper
  • Valley Between
